name: Verify Hallway Lighting Sequence
description: Validates that hallway lighting activates in the correct sequence when entering the area.
testObjective: Ensure lighting system creates proper visual effects during hallway entry.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in Region 1 or later
Player is approaching hallway from hibernation area

steps.action: Open the door to the hallway
Observe the lighting in the hallway
steps.expected: Lights activate from the far end, creating a sequential visual effect

steps.action: Verify lights turn on incrementally, not all at once
steps.expected: Lighting sequence proceeds smoothly from far to near
All lights remain on after sequence completes
